subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: J. J. Mann hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with 13.1 seconds left to help Belmont upset No. 12 North Carolina, 83-80, in Chapel Hill, N.C.
snippet: J. J. Mann hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with 13.1 seconds left to help Belmont upset No. 12 North Carolina, 83-80, in Chapel Hill, N.C.
